1) Not to be pedantic but if she's actively cheating on him with someone this is not NTR she's just chucking him, NTR implies a degree of non consensual from the female character part, as the MC himself assumes at first.

2) Not to be even more pedantic but that's still a Teacher Student relationship which implies a degree of power imbalance, and would probably make it illegal or at least against the school charter.

3) That being said nice story.
